settings.subtitle: yeedi mop station pro
settings.title: Every Detail Screams for Clean
settings.text: Automatically quench your mops' thirst to keep your floor clean and fresh
Subscribe to get special offers, free giveaways, and once-in-a-lifetime deals.

settings.title: Features
settings.content:
2 Spin and Pressurized Mops:
2 spin mopping pads with 10N downward pressure stick close to the floor to capture all dirt and debris.

Washing Machine for Your Mops: 
The self-cleaning station featuring 3500ml separate water tanks washes the dirty mops automatically like a washing machine.

2500Pa Suction Power:
Boast up to 2500Pa strong suction power to suck up dirt hidden deep in the crevices.

Navigate Smartly:
The Visual SLAM technology combined with the floor tracking sensor learns your home layout precisely and plans a neat and efficient cleaning path.

180mins Runtime & Auto Recharge:
The built-in 5200mAh battery fuels up 180mins of runtime on a single charge.  Automatically recharges and resumes cleaning.

settings.title: Specs
settings.content:
Model yeedi mop station pro/ yeedi k850+

Navigation Visual SLAM

Suction Power 600/1500/3000 Pa

Water Tank Capacity 240 ml

Water Flow Levels 3

Dustbin Capacity 450 ml

Dust Bag Capacity 2.5 L

Dimensions 350 x 350 x 77 mm (Robot)

300 x 420 x 430 mm (Self-Empty Station)

Battery Capacity 5200 mAh

Working Time 200 mins

Charging Time 6 Hours

Carpet Detection Yes

Auto-Boost Suction Yes

Obstacle Crossing Ability 9 mm

Control yeedi App/Alexa

settings.title: Warranty
settings.content: yeedi robot has automatic one year worry-free warranty from purchase date. Click to see more warranty policies.

settings.subtitle: YEEDI MOP STATION
settings.title: No More Hands-On Mop Washing
settings.text: Automatically quench your mops' thirst to keep your floor clean and fresh

settings.title: Mop Like a House Cleaning Expert
settings.text: yeedi’s two spin mopping pads are pressed tightly against the floor by a10Ndownward pressure toimitate manual mopping.

settings.subtitle: NO CROSS CONTAMINATION
settings.title: Built-In “Washing Machine” for Your Mops
settings.text:
yeedi’s self-cleaning station is like the washing machine
for your mops. It automatically scrubs the filthy mops repeatedly
and wash the dirt off every 10 minutes.

settings.subtitle: ultrasonic carpet sensor
settings.title: Care Your Carpet
settings.text: The built-in carpet sensor intelligently recognizes your carpet. yeedi will avoid reaching it when mopping and crank up suction when vacuuming to sweep up the embedded dirt.

settings.subtitle: Mop with Pressure
settings.title: Press Harder, Mop Better
settings.text: yeedi’s two spin mopping pads are pressed tightly against the floor by a 10N downward pressure to imitate manual mopping.

settings.subtitle: Mop and vacuum simultaneously
settings.title: Zero Tolerance for Debris
settings.text: Up to2500Pasuction power and a tangle-free silicone brush tackle crumbles, pet hair and dirt with ease.

settings.subtitle: no cross contamination
settings.title: Separate Water Tanks
settings.text: Features 2 water tanks, yeedi mop station sprays clean water to wash your mops and pumps the dirty water into the dirty water tank forsystematic water disposal.

settings.subtitle: Gigantic Water Tank
settings.title: Clean in One Fill
settings.text: The gigantic clean water tank with a capacity of 3500ml keeps your mopping pads clean and wet. Get your whole floor cleaned with merely one fill.

settings.title: Clean in Neat Paths No Spots Missed
settings.text: Learn your home layout and plan neat cleaning paths without missing any spots thanks to the VisualSLAMtechnology andfloor tracking sensor.

settings.title: Revolutionize the Way You Clean
settings.text: Clean anywhere at any time with our convenientyeedi app. Compatible withAmazon Alexa,Google Home Assistantandyandex Alicefor voice control.
